#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int fib(int n)
{
    if(n==1 || n==2)return 1;
    else return fib(n-1)+fib(n-2);
}


int main()
{
    int n,p;
    int v[39];
    v[0]=0;
    int i=1;
    while(i<=38)
    {
        v[i]=0;
        int t=fib(i);
        int x=5;
        while(x<=t)
        {
            v[i]=v[i]+t/x;
            x=x*5;
        }
        i++;
    }
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n>0)
    {
        scanf("%d",&p);
        printf("%d\n",v[p]);
        n--;
    }
}
